siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Smooth the path
frontmatter.description: We are heading into an unknown and it won't help if the path is equally bumpy for all. Look to smooth the path for others where possible because it will benefit everyone.

frontmatter.title: Staying active inside during the pandemic
frontmatter.description: Physical activity brings many benefits to moods, outlooks, and physical health. Develop routines to stay active indoors with the kids. Don't fall into a pattern of waiting for the right conditions to get moving again.

frontmatter.title: Back to school at home
frontmatter.description: New routines will evolve. School will continue. Kids will learn.

frontmatter.title: Demonstrate what's important
frontmatter.description: It's easy to get caught up in the details and be sidetracked by others. Make it easier with a better structure to each day that emphasizes importance in the right places.

frontmatter.title: Proud dad day
frontmatter.description: Seven years ago I became a dad. So much has changed and I couldn't be prouder of my seven year old son today.

frontmatter.title: Self sufficient habits
frontmatter.description: Tomorrow is back to school. Whether it's one or two kids, my attention must be with them.

frontmatter.title: Be the person you want your kids to be
frontmatter.description: Be a better father by being a better role model. Demonstrate string virtues and values. Take time and be supportive.
